subject: Applying for Remote Web Developer, Designer position
preview: Hello Sir, Hope you are going well! I am Katherine, a Web Developer and Designer. I was searching for Web Designing and Development Agencies having vacancies and found your name on that list. I am wri

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hello Sir,

Hope you are going well!

I am Katherine, a Web Developer and Designer. I was searching for Web Designing and Development Agencies having vacancies and found your name on that list. I am writing this email to inquire if there is an opening for me as I am looking for a job.

I have 6+ years of experience in WEB DEVELOPMENT and DESIGNING. My objective is to provide QUALITY SERVICES to my clients and to establish LONG-TERM BUSINESS RELATIONSHIP with them.

As an individual freelancer with over 6 years of hands-on experience in Web Development and Designing at freelance and industry level, I am positive that I will be a good fit for your company. I am a fast learner, a team player, creative, timely and committed Developer. I learn quite fast and tend to be very good at what I do.

Whether you are starting a new project from the ground up or need development on an existing product, I can work on every aspect of your project (from front-end design to back-end integration), or just certain parts, based on your specific needs.

Glimpse on my skills:

Tools prefer to work on regular basis:
Photoshop (9/10)
Illustrator (8/10)
Adobe XD (8/10)
Figma (8/10)
Sublime (9/10)

Front-end:
Javascript (9/10)
JQuery (9/10)
CSS3 (9/10)
Sass (8/10)
Bootstrap (9/10)

Back-end:
PHP (9/10)
MySQL (8/10)

CMS:
Wordpress (9/10)
Shopify (9/10)

MVC Frameworks:
Laravel (8/10)
CodeIgniter (8/10)

APIs:
Twitter (8/10)
Facebook (8/10)
Instagram (8/10)
LeadPages (7/10)
ActiveCampaign (7/10)
Klaviyo (7/10)
MailChimp (7/10)
Refersion (8/10)
Clickfunnels (8/10)

SVN:
Git (7/10)
BitBucket (7/10)

Project Management Tools:
Asana (8/10)
Trello (8/10)
Basecamp (8/10)
Jira (8/10)

Additionally, I have the following qualities:
Detail-oriented and organized. I work well in teams and on my own.
High energy, hard-working with the ability to organise my own workload effectively and prioritise tasks
I will make sure that the work which I deliver is of high quality and well tested as well as the source code is clean, simple and maintainable.

I will respond to your message within 24 hours or less and at the moment, I am available for a full-time role that is 8 hours a day and 40 hours a week. Willing to get started on a project or hourly basis as well.

My Skype ID is katjoyyponla@gmail.com

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Thanks,

Regards,
Katherine
